item_category: Lenovo Tab M10 HD is a 2nd-generation 10.1-inch HD tablet that packs a wallop while sporting a premium metal look and feel. A great device that offers top-notch visual and audio, it's also built for families, featuring curated kid's content, parental controls.
review_title: Good tablet just a shame the dont take sim cards
review_text: I bought this Levono for my wife for her 80th birthday she loves it. She finds it a lot more easer to manage than her Kindle Fire.
Bought this as a replacement for ancient Hudl which was running really slowly. Mainly used for emails and youtube music videos. Just the job for that, very happy
Works well does everything I want it for and misses is happy as plenty of space for games

Bought it for the kids during lock down and made it kids safe mode, and downloaded loads of educational apps. They love it and kept them busy.

I was close getting a second hand ipad but went for this and good thing I did. 
Sound camera and screen quality all perfect.
Good tablet baught for my son
Works great. Good size  good speed
Was very excited, now wish I'd spent more on a Samsung... respect ):

Really pleased with this replacement for my older Lenovo tab which had decided to give up the ghost. The only negative is a very smooth and shiny back, which means it has a tendency to fall onto the floor if you put it down on the arm of a chair!
Decent size, great display, fantastic battery life and responsive operating system, altogether an excellent choice.
